abstract: New York Jets coach Todd Bowles undergoes surgery during off-season to remove noncancerous tumor from his throat; other football news noted.
snippet: Jets Coach Todd Bowles said Wednesday that a noncancerous tumor had been removed from his throat shortly after the team’s season concluded.
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Todd Bowles said Wednesday that a noncancerous tumor had been removed from his throat shortly after the team’s season concluded.
